In good memories of a Japanese buffet place in Barcelona 5 years ago (which we could not find anymore) we tried Wok Dao. Sadly, it was very disappointing. Of course you have a massive selection of sea food for Teppanyaki and also prepared food (from Chinese dishes over sea food to Spanish food - which is already a bad sign for an asian restaurant) but the quality is questionable. All fish, mussels and crustaceans were defrosted. Except for the veggies nothing seemed fresh. So if you are hungry and don't care much about quality to fill your stomach for 16 Euro it's the place to go...
